SELECT * FROM nft_data_detail WHERE type_num=#{typeNum}

SELECT SUBSTRING(nd.nft_original_date::VARCHAR, 1, 4) AS dateType FROM nft_data nd JOIN nft_data_detail ndd ON nd.detail_num = ndd.detail_num WHERE ndd.type_num = #{detailNum} AND nd.del_yn = 'N' AND nd.hide_yn = 'N' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 desc

SELECT ntflist.nft_num, ntflist.user_num, ntflist.nft_title, ntflist.nft_publisher, ntflist.nft_owner, ntflist.nft_original_date, ndd.detail_num, ndd.type_num, ndd.detail_name, ndi.img_num, ntflist.nft_id -- ntflist.nft_cnt FROM ntflist JOIN nft_data_detail ndd ON ntflist.detail_num = ndd.detail_num JOIN nft_data_img ndi ON ntflist.nft_num = ndi.nft_num WHERE ntflist.detail_num = #{detailNum} AND ndd.type_num = #{typeNum} ORDER BY ntflist.nft_num DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE encode(input::bytea, 'hex') LIKE '%fd216f30%' AND encode(input::bytea, 'hex') LIKE '%' || #{nftIdHex} || '%'

SELECT ntflist.nft_num, ntflist.user_num, ntflist.nft_title, ntflist.nft_publisher, ntflist.nft_owner, ntflist.nft_original_date, ndd.detail_num, ndd.type_num, ndd.detail_name, ndi.img_num, ntflist.nft_id -- ntflist.nft_cnt FROM ntflist JOIN nft_data_detail ndd ON ntflist.detail_num = ndd.detail_num JOIN nft_data_img ndi ON ntflist.nft_num = ndi.nft_num WHERE ntflist.detail_num = #{detailNum} AND ndd.type_num = #{typeNum} AND ntflist.nft_original_date LIKE CONCAT(#{dateType},'%') ORDER BY ntflist.nft_num DESC;
SELECT nft_id FROM nft_data WHERE nft_num=#{nftNum}

SELECT nd.nft_num, nd.user_num, nd.nft_title, nd.nft_publisher, nd.nft_owner, nd.nft_original_date, ndd.detail_num, ndd.type_num, ndd.detail_name, ndd.detail_attach, ndi.img_num, nd.nft_id, tr.id, TO_CHAR(tr.createdt, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS createdt, COALESCE( ( SELECT COUNT(t2.fcn) AS nft_cnt FROM transactions_nipanft t2 WHERE t2.fcn = 'Read_NFT' AND t2.nft_id = nd.nft_id ), 0) AS nft_cnt FROM nft_data nd JOIN nft_data_detail ndd ON nd.detail_num = ndd.detail_num JOIN nft_data_img ndi ON ndi.nft_num = nd.nft_num LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CAST(t1.nft_num AS INT), t1.nft_id, t1.nft_status, t1.createdt, t1.id FROM transactions_nipanft t1 LEFT JOIN channel c1 ON c1.channel_genesis_hash = t1.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c1.name='digitalzonenipanft' AND t1.nft_status = 'NFT_CREATE' )tr ON tr.nft_id = nd.nft_id WHERE tr.nft_status = 'NFT_CREATE' AND nd.nft_num=#{nftNum} AND nd.del_yn = 'N' AND nd.hide_yn = 'N'

SELECT nd.nft_num, nd.user_num, nd.nft_title, nd.nft_publisher, nd.nft_owner, nd.nft_original_date, nd.nft_uri, ndd.detail_num, ndd.type_num, ndd.detail_name, ndd.detail_attach, ndi.img_num, nd.nft_id, concat('0x', encode(bh.hash, 'hex')) AS hash, TO_CHAR(bh.timestamp, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS createdt, COALESCE( ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE encode(input::bytea, 'hex') LIKE '%fd216f30%' AND encode(input::bytea, 'hex') LIKE '%' || #{nftIdHex} || '%' ), 0) AS nft_cnt FROM nft_data nd JOIN nft_data_detail ndd ON nd.detail_num = ndd.detail_num JOIN nft_data_img ndi ON ndi.nft_num = nd.nft_num LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b1.timestamp, t1.hash FROM transactions t1 LEFT JOIN blocks b1 ON b1.hash = t1.block_hash WHERE encode(t1.input::bytea, 'hex') LIKE '%8e15ee89%' AND encode(t1.input::bytea, 'hex') LIKE '%' || #{nftIdHex} || '%' ) bh ON bh.timestamp IS NOT NULL WHERE nd.nft_num=#{nftNum} AND nd.del_yn = 'N' AND nd.hide_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE nft_data SET read_cnt = read_cnt+1 WHERE nft_num=#{nftNum};

SELECT COUNT(nd.*) FROM nft_data nd JOIN nft_data_detail ndd ON nd.detail_num = ndd.detail_num WHERE ndd.type_num = #{typeNum} AND nd.del_yn = 'N' AND nd.hide_yn = 'N'

SELECT nd.nft_num, nd.user_num, nd.nft_title, nd.nft_id, nd.nft_publisher, nd.nft_owner, nd.nft_original_date, nd.hide_yn, CASE WHEN nd.del_yn='N' THEN '발행' ELSE '삭제' END AS del_yn, ndd.type_num FROM nft_data nd LEFT JOIN( SELECT nd1.nft_num, (row_number() over(order by nd1.nft_num desc)) AS rnum FROM nft_data nd1 JOIN nft_data_detail ndd1 ON nd1.detail_num = ndd1.detail_num WHERE ndd1.type_num = #{typeNum} )nd2 ON nd.nft_num = nd2.nft_num JOIN nft_data_detail ndd ON nd.detail_num = ndd.detail_num WHERE rnum >= (#{pageNum}-1)*#{listNum}+1 AND rnum <= #{pageNum}*#{listNum} AND ndd.type_num = #{typeNum} ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT COUNT(nd.*) FROM nft_data nd JOIN nft_data_detail ndd ON nd.detail_num = ndd.detail_num WHERE ndd.type_num = #{typeNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE nft_data SET hide_yn = CASE WHEN hide_yn = 'Y' THEN 'N' WHEN hide_yn = 'N' THEN 'Y' END WHERE nft_num=#{nftNum}
